author: Arutz Sheva
title: Ground News - Min. Golan leads delegation to UN: 'I will make the victims' silenced voices heard'
text:
Summary by Arutz Sheva Min. May Golan to be present during United Nations Security Council meeting on Hamas rapes, sexual violence - after five months of the UN ignoring the matter. 'I will make the victims' silenced voices heard.' Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
